text: The Fiat Multipla is a car produced by Fiat between 1998 and 2010. The original model became well known for its styling that divided opinion before it was facelifted in 2004. Fiat discontinued the model in 2010. It is a MPV version of the Fiat Bravo. == Engines == * 1.6 16V 76 kW (103 hp) * 1.9 JTD 77 kW (105 hp), 81 kW (110 hp) and 85 kW (115 hp) * 1.9 Multijet 88 kW (120 hp) Multipla Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Fiat Multipla
